import "./App.css"; import { useState } from "react"; import { BookCurrentlyReading, BookWantToRead, BookRead, } from "./components/Books/Book"; import { search } from "./BooksAPI"; function App() { const [showSearchPage, setShowSearchpage] = useState(false); const [searchValue, setSearchValue] = useState(""); const [searchResult, setSearchResult] = useState([]); const handleChange = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); setSearchValue(event.target.value); let result = await search(event.target.value); console.log(result); setSearchResult(result); console.log(result, "result"); }; return (
{showSearchPage ? (
setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)} > Close
    {searchResult.map((result, id) => { return (
  1. {result.title}
    {result.authors.map((author) => author)}
    2. ); })}
) : (

MyReads

return

Currently Reading

;
  1. To Kill a Mockingbird
    Harper Lee
  2. Ender's Game
    Orson Scott Card
setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)}>Add a book
)}
); } export default App;
